page.title: 18Impressions of Westhill
page.content:
Five people were interviewed in connection with this topic.A ten year old boy,a teenager girl,a housewife,a female commuter to Westhill and an elderly male.
All of the people liked the look of Westhill e.g.the houses and buildings. No-one thought there were enough facilities for their age group in Westhill.40% wanted a swimming pool;others asked for sports complex and dancing.Everybodys first impression were good e.g.they liked the area etc.Most of the peoples first impressions have not yet changed.60% thought Westhill should stay the same size.20% thought the people of Westhill were not friendly.20% of the people wanted a cafe,clothes shop and a shoe shop.60% thought Westhill would become unpopular because of growth.
